content.heroIntro: Welcome to LA ISLA III, an exceptional residential development by VARUDI located in the coveted Alba del Sol neighborhood of Torrevieja, Alicante. This premium project offers 2 carefully designed units combining contemporary architecture with Mediterranean charm, perfect for families and investors seeking coastal living at unbeatable value. With prices starting from just €279,000 and delivery scheduled for December 2026, LA ISLA III represents a rare opportunity to invest in Spain's largest expat community where English is widely spoken everywhere. The development features modern 3-bedroom apartments and bungalows built to the highest standards, each offering 79-96m² of thoughtfully planned living space with premium finishes. VARUDI's reputation for quality construction and attention to detail ensures your new home meets rigorous European building standards. Alba del Sol's strategic location puts you just minutes from the stunning Blue Flag beaches of Playa del Cura, world-class golf courses, excellent healthcare facilities, and an abundance of international amenities.

locationSection.intro: Alba del Sol in Torrevieja is one of Spain's most desirable residential areas, renowned for its cosmopolitan atmosphere and exceptional quality of life. This well-established neighborhood attracts thousands of international residents annually, creating a vibrant community where English is the second language. Located on the southern Costa Blanca, Alba del Sol offers the perfect balance between beach village charm and modern convenience. The area boasts excellent infrastructure including the modern Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja providing 24-hour emergency care, international schools serving expat families, and comprehensive shopping centers. Just minutes away lies Playa del Cura, a pristine Blue Flag beach ideal for swimming and water sports. The neighborhood's proximity to world-renowned golf courses like Villamartín (15 minutes), combined with its year-round Mediterranean climate and affordable cost of living approximately 45% lower than Costa Blanca North, makes Alba del Sol an investment hotspot with consistent +8% year-on-year property appreciation.
